channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Peacock Promo Code & Deals: 16% Off July 2025
item.description: Stream your favorite shows for up to $80 off this July, and save on subscription plans with the latest Peacock TV coupons from WIRED.

item.title: Nvidia is set to resume China chip sales after months of regulatory whiplash
item.description: Nvidia announced Monday that it’s filing applications to restart sales of its H20 artificial intelligence chips to China, capping a spasmodic few mont...

item.title: Nextdoor redesigns app with AI recommendations, local news, and real-time emergency alerts
item.description: Neighborhood social app Nextdoor is launching a redesigned version of its service that it’s calling the “new Nextdoor.”

item.title: Tesla finally enters India — nine years after Elon Musk first teased its debut
item.description: Tesla has made its long-awaited entry into India with the opening of its first showroom in Mumbai.

item.title: NZXT Discount Codes: 50% Off
item.description: Save 50%, plus up to $250 with NZXT promo codes and discounts.

item.title: The Enshittification of American Power
item.description: First Google and Facebook, then the world. Under Trump 2.0, US statecraft is starting to mimic the worst tendencies of Big Tech.

item.title: Meta is reportedly using actual tents to build data centers

item.title: It's Not Just Epstein. MAGA Is Angry About a Lot of Things
item.description: Pockets of Donald Trump’s most loyal base are increasingly angry at what they view as the administration’s failure to fulfill its promises.
